str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.

str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.
